eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Kittitas, WA; AT 08:45 PM ON SEP 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:45 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
This is a test, only a test of the Emergency Alert System in Kittitas County. 

Issued by Kittitas County Emergency Management.

If this had been an actual emergency, you would have been instructed what to do.  

No Action is required.

The following tones will conclude this test.
